message: The open tournament every Saturday is a good place to start
Oh yea, is this for upcoming teh pwn tourneys?
and those are mainly online right Kevin?
For StarCraft (which I know a ton of you play), http://www.reddit.com/r/starcraft always has awesome tourneys and king of the hills
oh no no no, it's for everything. I was just wondering. I know that Andrew Johnson plays like 10 online every week lol.
it's not just for our tournaments, we want to make sure all the members are informed about what's going on in the gaming community outside the group :)
